oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various Performances of the Bailes Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The tape is of a variety of performances by: the Bailes Brothers (musicial group), the Delmore Brothers (musicial group), and Esco Hankins (entertainer) (possibily). The various recording are from different unidentified dates. "One has My Name" is believed to be from Hayride.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bailes Brothers; Delmore Brothers; Esco Hankins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Building on the Sand (Bailes Brothers) -- (01:54) The Book of Revelations (Delmore Brothers) -- (04:12) He's Coming to Us Dead (Unconfirmed) (Esco Hankins [unconfirmed]) -- (07:17) Oh So Many Years (Bailes Brothers) -- (09:08) One has My Name (Johnny Bailes) -- (11:52) Building on the Sand (Bailes Brothers) -- (14:04) I Found a Way (Bailes Brothers) -- (15:48) Unidentified boy speaking and reading from Primary Reader (Bailes Brothers) -- (18:40) I'd Like to Spend Christmas at Home (Walter Bailes) -- (21:40) Forgive My Friend (Bailes Brothers)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bailes Brothers; Delmore Brothers; Hankins, Esco;
